name: Before the Cocoa gets Cold
description:
Created for Winter MelonJam. A fast-paced, top-down RPG in which you must keep your hot cocoa warm while collecting presents for your friends and fighting snowy fiends who threaten to freeze your drink. Once you collect all the presents scattered across the snow-covered forest, you can return to your house and celebrate the holidays with your friends.
